entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
